root.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Heroes
root.description: Dungeons and Dragons: Heroes is a 4 player dungeon-crawling adventure game similar to Gauntlet. The game is loosely based on the 3rd Edition of Dungeons and Dragons. Much of that is in items and spells, and not as much in gameplay. You can play as a human-fighter, a dwarven- cleric, a halfling-rogue, or an elf- wizard. Each player must pick one of those characters in multiplayer, and are not able to pick the same character as someone else.In the story, all 4 characters are brought back to life to fight a wizard they defeated over a century ago. You fight such bosses as Beholders, and other Dungeons and Dragons enemies.
